body:
try this.

if ($result->num_rows > 0) { 
    while ($row = mysqli_fetch_assoc($result)) {
        //$row["your column name"]
        if (empty($row["twohundred"]) || $row["twohundred"]=='0' || $row["twohundred"]==0) { 
            echo 'Status: ERROR'; 
        } else {
            echo 'Status: OK'; 
        }
    }
}
title: How to display Status ERROR if sql columns has zero value?
